paragraph.materialsCitation:
MATERIAL EXAMINED. —
China .
Sichuan ,
Farges 41
( P ). DESCRIPTION

subSubSection.paragraph: Endocarp horseshoe-shaped, rounded in outline with excavated faces; two dorsal ridges, one lateral ridge on each side, all ridges bearing about 13 small outgrowths; dorsal face with two lateral concavities; smooth surface; the two limbs ending at the same level, one more inwards; double external condyle, not perforated. Length, 6.4 mm ; width, 6.2 mm ; thickness, 3.3 mm .

MATERIAL EXAMINED. —
Madagascar .
C. Birkinshaw 575 ( P ).

Endocarp horseshoe-shaped, rounded in outline without excavated faces; one dorsal ridge, one slight lateral ridge on each side; surface slightly reticulated; dorsal face convex; central area filled, limiting the condyle to a sharp line surrounding it. Length, 10.5 mm ; width, 10.2 mm ; thickness, 5.6 mm .

MATERIAL EXAMINED. —
Central African Republic .
Oubangui, Boukoko, C. Tisserant 1995 ( P ).
Endocarp hairpin-shaped, elliptic in outline; one dorsal ridge; surface rugose with some grooves; limbs
B1 B2 B3 D1 D2 D3 E1
F1 F2 G1 I1 I2 I3 A4 C1 C2
J1 J2 J3 K1 K2 L1 L2
ending parallel and of same length; double intrusive lateral condyle very thin. Length, 13.7 mm ; width, 9.3 mm ; thickness, 6.4 mm .

MATERIAL EXAMINED. —
Gabon .
Libreville, Klaine 1868 ( P ).

Central African Republic .
Oubangui, Boukoko, C.Tisserant 1256 ( P ).

Endocarp straight, rounded in outline with ventral condyle; one dorsal ridge, three slightly developed lateral ridges on each side, the outer one pointed at its extremities; keeled at apex and slightly so at base; surface rugose; simple intrusive condyle developed in large protruding ventral chamber, transverse elliptic aperture 5.0 mm long and 1.0- 1.5 mm wide. Length, 9.5-12.5 mm ; width, 6.9-8.6 mm ; thickness, 6.1-6.5 mm .

MATERIAL EXAMINED. —
Gabon .
Libreville, Klaine 2580 ( P ).

Annular endocarp, rounded in outline; one dorsal ring; dorsal face with two lateral concavities; surface reticulate; limbs joined; central area totally perforated. Length, 13.0 mm; width, 12.0 mm; thickness, 8.7 mm .

MATERIAL EXAMINED. —
Guyana .
R. C. Ek 1034 (U).

Endocarp hairpin-shaped, elliptic in outline; one dorsal groove, one lateral groove on each side; surface with shallow reticulated grooves; one limb thinner and slightly shorter than the other; condyle not visible externally. Length, 25.2 mm ; width, 17.9 mm ; thickness, 14.1 mm .

MATERIAL EXAMINED. —
Vietnam .
Cult. Hort. Bot., Ho Chi Minh City ,
Hiêp 819
( P )
.

Endocarp hairpin-shaped, elliptic in outline; one dorsal ridge, no lateral ridges; surface reticulated; limbs ending comma-shaped; double intrusive lateral condyle. Length, 9.0 mm; width, 5.8 mm ; thickness, 4.9 mm .
